# API Reference

Complete API reference for the CNG Datasets toolkit.

## Modules

- [Vector Processing](api/vector.md) - H3 tiling and vector data processing
- [Raster Processing](api/raster.md) - COG creation and raster to H3 conversion
- [Kubernetes](api/k8s.md) - Kubernetes job generation and management
- [Storage](api/storage.md) - S3 bucket management and rclone syncing
